Posts.Content: Feb 22, 2016 07:43PM CynthiaB wrote: Sorry you're going through this. The worry and waiting is awful. I think most everyone here would agree on that. Try to remain positive until your tests are complete and until you get more information from the mammogram. It's good that you're getting the tests you need. I have had bunches of mammograms, MRI's and Ultrasounds and even though in the end I was diagnosed (after many years) with breast cancer...I'm still here, I'm in pretty good shape and hopeful for my future. Everyone here will support you. Take care of yourself and try be nice to you.
Posts.Title: Mammogram this Thursday! So scared! Mom77 Mom77
